revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Cave of Origin |image = [[File:Cave of Origin.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Cave of Origin. |tokens = 34,000 |location = On the West of Route 135, Northwest of Sootopolis City. }} '''Cave of Origin''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. ==Pokémon & Dungeon Stats== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Random Encounter !! Base Health !! Boss !! Base Health |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || rowspan=4 |
590,000 || rowspan=2|[[File:Exploud.png|40px]] Exploud || rowspan=2|
2,000,000 |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Sableye.png|40px]] Sableye || [[File:Kyogre.png|40px]] '''Kyogre*''' || rowspan=2|
4,700,000 |- | [[File:Mawile.png|40px]] Mawile || [[File:Groudon.png|40px]] '''Groudon*'''
'''*(Must be Hoenn Champion)''' |} ==Items== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Egg}} [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |} [[Category:Dungeons]]
